_header: Young men I rede that ye beware
Note:
See Utley (1944)
XUtley, Francis Lee. The Crooked Rib.
Ohio State Contributions in Language and Literature 10. Columbus, OH: Ohio State UP, 1944. 400.
Subjects: wives, shrewish; carols, of marriage; marriage
_description: Beware of a shrewish wife — three quatrains and burden: ‘In soro & car he led hys lyfe / Þat haue a schrow ontyll is wyfe’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Ȝyng men I red þat ȝe be warThat ȝe cum not in
                    þe snar…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…sorow he hath both vp & downþat haue a schrow on to
                    hys wyf
